name: Divi Lightbox for Jetpack Tiled Galleries
author: Saskia Teichmann

sections.description:
This plugin adds Divi’s integrated Lightbox effect to Jetpack Tiled Galleries as well as any image that wasn’t placed by Divi Image module, but via “Add media” and is linked to media file.. This is a very lightweight plugin, which has almost no impact on pageload.
Requirements:
+ Activated Divi theme or Divi child theme (Divi is a Premium Theme created by ElegantThemes.)
+ Activated Jetpack plugin with following modules enabled: Photon (to be found in Dashboard > Jetpack > Settings) and Tiled Galleries (to be found in Dashboard > Settings > Media)

Do you want to contribute or help improving this plugin?

You can find it on GitHub: https://github.com/s-a-s-k-i-a/Divi-Lightbox-for-Jetpack-Tiled-Galleries/
Please find a live demo of the plugin here: https://lightbox-test.saskialund.de/

Do you want to know more about me?

Visit my webpage: www.saskialund.de

From within WordPress

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘Divi Lightbox for Jetpack Tiled Galleries’
  3. Activate Divi Lightbox for Jetpack Tiled Galleries from your Plugins page.

Manually

  1. Upload the divi-lightbox-for-jetpack-tiled-galleries folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the Divi Lightbox for Jetpack Tiled Galleries plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Known issues

  1. Incompatibility with Surbma Divi Lightbox plugin.
sections.faq: If you have any questions, please use the Issue section of this plugin’s Github development repository, which can be found here: https://github.com/s-a-s-k-i-a/Divi-Lightbox-for-Jetpack-Tiled-Galleries/issues
sections.changelog:
1.1.2

Release Date: August 14th, 2024

  • Compatibility with latest Jetpack, Divi and WordPress versions
  • readme.txt updated
  • Versioning
  • Improvement: Honoring new repository guidelines regarding length of description

1.1.0

Release Date: November 22, 2023

  • Compatibility with latest Jetpack, Divi and WordPress versions
  • readme.txt updated
  • Versioning

1.0.10

Release Date: July 10, 2020

  • Compatibility with latest Jetpack 8.7.x and Divi 4.5.x
  • readme.txt updated
  • Versioning

1.0.9

Release Date: August 3rd, 2019

  • Compatibility with latest Jetpack 7.5.x and Divi 5.26.x
  • readme.txt updated
  • Versioning

1.0.8

Release Date: June 5th, 2018

  • Compatibility with latest Jetpack 6.1.1 and WordPress 4.9.6
  • readme.txt updated
  • Versioning

1.0.7

Release Date: April 4th, 2018

  • Compatibility with latest Jetpack 6.0 and WordPress 4.9.5
  • readme.txt updated
  • Versioning

1.0.6

Release Date: July 25th, 2017

  • Hotfix for an issue causing Divi’s native gallery to no longer open with paginated lightbox overlay
  • readme.txt updated
  • Versioning

1.0.5

Release Date: July 25th, 2017

  • german Translation files added (formal and informal)
  • readme.txt updated
  • Versioning

1.0.4

Release Date: July 25th, 2017

  • added lightbox functionality to any image linked to media files, which was placed using “Add media” instead of Divi Image module
  • readme.txt updated
  • readme.md updated
  • Versioning

1.0.3

Release Date: July 25th, 2017

  • renaming of main plugin file to match WordPress.org regulation
  • readme.txt updated
  • readme.md updated
  • Versioning

1.0.2

Release Date: July 23rd, 2017

  • readme.txt updated
  • Versioning

1.0.1

Release Date: July 23rd, 2017

  • Check for activated Divi Theme or Child Theme
  • Check for activated Jetpack plugin
  • Minor code cleanouts
  • Versioning

1.0.0

Release Date: July 22nd, 2017

  • Initial release.
  • First commit to WordPress repo.

short_description: Adds Divi's native lightbox effect to Jetpack Tiled galleries and images placed via "Add media". Requires an activated Divi theme.
